title: Practical FPGA-Based DNN Design Debugging and Tuning

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Implementation of an FPGA-based DNN optimization process as a team project in a smartphone-centric, limited-technology environment.

learning_goals: Perform real-time performance profiling of DNN designs running on FPGA using OTune overlay-based tools.
Acquire methods to tune fixed-point DNN designs with overhead within 4%, considering hardware resource constraints.

Within 1–6 months, learners collaborate with team members to develop a prototype of an adaptive learning system for edge devices and submit deliverables meeting the following criteria: 1) Implementation of a Minimum Viable Product (MVP) runnable on Raspberry Pi 4 or Jetson Nano, 2) Real-time data processing latency of ≤500ms, 3) ≥80% compliance with team role allocation plans and weekly progress reports.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
